813-REPORT-CEREMONIAL-VS-FUNCTIONAL-AUDI.reason: First systematic audit of HestAI governance functionality - synthesizes findings from 6 explore agents analyzing 18 session logs across 3 projects over 36 days - establishes baseline metrics (60-70% functional vs 30-40% initial estimate) with evidence-based recommendations
key_findings: RAPH protocol 100% functional with behavioral prediction accuracy
TDD discipline mixed - constitutional but not automated
North Star I1/I7/I8 actively functional, I2-I12 underutilized
